t: Veronese Design
s: The "Veronese", in spite of the name, is not an Italian company, but it is a multinational, one of the largest companies that produce fantasy art, using resin of the highest quality, with different processes and finishes. From ceramized to bronzed to neoclassical. His creations are characterized by a careful study of the proportions of the body, as well as the detail of the face.
